data.title: Jesse Metcalfe Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Jesse Metcalfe on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Jesse Metcalfe including Beyond a Reasonable Doubt, John Tucker Must Die,â¦
data.text:
A Weekend in the Country

As both their lovers linger in comas, Susan and Ian decide to escape for a weekend in the country, while Nora continues to force her way into Lynette and Tom's life.

Art Isn't Easy

Bob and Lee's front-yard water sculpture prompts the neighborhood association into action; Edie finds out about the affair Carlos is having with Gaby; the Solises' former gardener, John (Jesse Metcalfe), wants to rekindle his romance with Gaby.

The God-Why-Don't-You-Love-Me Blues

As Katherine unravels after losing Mike, Bree comes to her aid; Gaby becomes concerned of John's intentions towards Ana; Lynette asks her family for more help around the house; Susan learns Julie has been harboring secrets; Angie throws a party for Danny.

Never Judge a Lady By Her Lover

A chance encounter reunites Gaby with her ex-lover and gardener; Bree contemplates a weekend getaway with Karl; Lynette and Tom tell their kids that she's pregnant again; Susan is convinced Angie's son is responsible for her daughter's attack.

Extinction

Clark discovers that someone is hunting people who have been affected by the meteor rocks--and the killer's next target is Lex. Clark uses his powers to save Lex but is caught off guard when the killer learns his weakness and shoots him with a kryptonite bullet. Meanwhile, Lex returns to work for LuthorCorp, but the animosity between him and his father continues unabated.
